events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund immediately as it does not meet my needs.
The system has categorised the request as a Refund issue based on the keywords and customer complaint details.
An available customer support agent has been assigned to handle the refund request for the customer.
Hello, thank you for contacting us. I understand that you want a refund because you received the wrong item.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can verify the issue?
My order number is 123456789, and I have attached a photo of the wrong product that was shipped to me.
We will process a full refund to your original payment method within 3 to 5 business days. You do not need to return the wrong item.
Thank you for the quick response and for not requiring the return. I appreciate your help resolving this.
The refund has been approved and your case is now resolved. Expect the money back soon.
We are checking in to confirm you have received the refund and are satisfied with the resolution.
Yes, I received the refund today. Everything is in order now. Thank you for your great support!
Closing the case as the refund has been received and the customer confirmed satisfaction with the resolution.
